alert.note: Alert for Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 19 at 3:48PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Yavapai County, northeast of Yarnell, through 415 PM MST... At 348 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Walnut Grove, or 19 miles southwest of Prescott. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Walnut Grove, Wagoner, Yarnell, Peeples Valley and Glen Ilah. This includes State Route 89 between mile markers 276 and 288. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins
